summary: Early Production Material From Mario Cartoon Revealed In eBay Auction
title: Early Production Material From Mario Cartoon Revealed In eBay Auction
body:
Thanks to the miraculous electronic garage sale known as eBay, we now know more about the production of the Super Mario Bros. Super Show than we did 24 hours ago. An estate sale from a former executive at animation studio DiC has yielded rare pitch art from the early days of the Mario cartoon. Based…

Early Production Material From Mario Cartoon Revealed In eBay Auction was originally published on popgeeks.com

summary: RETAILERS REVEAL MORE PREORDER BONUSES FOR CLANNAD IN JAPAN
title: RETAILERS REVEAL MORE PREORDER BONUSES FOR CLANNAD IN JAPAN
body: CLANNAD hits the Switch in Japan on July 4th, 2019, and today two more retailers have revealed their preorder bonuses. Animate will be offering a photographic portrait of two of the characters, while Imajin Web Shop is releasing a cloth poster pack that is 84 inches high and 59 inches wide.

reblog.comment: CLANNAD hits the Switch in Japan on July 4th, 2019, and today two more retailers have revealed their preorder bonuses. Animate will be offering a photographic portrait of two of the characters, while Imajin Web Shop is releasing a cloth poster pack that is 84 inches high and 59 inches wide.

Animate will be offering a photographic portrait of two of the characters, while Imajin Web Shop is releasing a cloth poster pack that is 84 inches high and 59 inches wide.

summary: Inside Final Fantasy X/X-2, uma conversa com os criadores
title: Inside Final Fantasy X/X-2, uma conversa com os criadores
body:
Inside Final Fantasy X/X-2, uma conversa com os criadores

Com o lançamento de Final Fantasy X/X-2 Remaster para Nintendo Switch, a Square Enix apresenta uma série de entrevistas com as mentes criativas responsáveis por essas fantásticas obras.

Confira a entrevista com Yoshinori Kitase ( Produtor ), Motomu Toriyama ( Diretor de Eventos do X/ Diretor do X-2 ), Yusuke Naora ( Diretor de Arte ) e Takashi Katano( Programador Principal de Eventos ),…

summary: CADENCE OF HYRULE'S SWITCH ESHOP LISTING LIVE IN EUROPE
title: CADENCE OF HYRULE'S SWITCH ESHOP LISTING LIVE IN EUROPE
body: All signs point to Cadence of Hyrule releasing sometime this month. While we don’t have official word from Nintendo, we do know that a Spring 2019 release is in the cards. Adding more fuel to the fire is a new eShop listing for the game in Europe that just went live. The listing has likely gone up in advance of a release later this month. Keep your fingers crossed!

reblog.comment: All signs point to Cadence of Hyrule releasing sometime this month. While we don’t have official word from Nintendo, we do know that a Spring 2019 release is in the cards. Adding more fuel to the fire is a new eShop listing for the game in Europe that just went live. The listing has likely gone up in advance of a release later this month. Keep your fingers crossed!

summary: ADIDAS ANNOUNCES POKEMON NEO PRODUCT LINE IN CHINA
title: ADIDAS ANNOUNCES POKEMON NEO PRODUCT LINE IN CHINA
body: Remember the adidas x Pokemon shoes we posted about a few weeks ago? Turns out they’re part of a whole line of Pokemon merch from adidas. The Pokemon adidas Neo merch lineup is now officially confirmed, and it’s going to see release in China. The full lineup of products includes sneakers, hats, other Pokemon apparel, plush dolls, and figurines. All these items launch in China on May 10th, 2019.

reblog.comment: Remember the adidas x Pokemon shoes we posted about a few weeks ago? Turns out they’re part of a whole line of Pokemon merch from adidas. The Pokemon adidas Neo merch lineup is now officially confirmed, and it’s going to see release in China. The full lineup of products includes sneakers, hats, other Pokemon apparel, plush dolls, and figurines. All these items launch in China on May 10th, 2019.

The full lineup of products includes sneakers, hats, other Pokemon apparel, plush dolls, and figurines. All these items launch in China on May 10th, 2019.

summary: JAPANESE AMBASSADOR TO SWEDEN SEES PIKACHU AS 'HIS SON'
title: JAPANESE AMBASSADOR TO SWEDEN SEES PIKACHU AS 'HIS SON'
body:
Shigeyuki Hiroki, Japanese ambassador to Sweden, has a very special place in his heart for Pikachu. He has such love for the character that he took to Twitter to share the following sentiment.

“The first time I saw Pikachu, I felt that he was my son. When Pokémon Go came out in 2016, Pikachu and the other millions of figures got new friends around the world. Now I will gladly see the Detective Pikachu movie.”

Well isn’t that a lovely blurb? I didn’t know a thing about Mr. Hiroki 10 minutes ago, but now I consider myself a fan!

summary: really early concept sketches of miracle (it’s old man, aging badly) and further development of crafter. i wanted to make him...

really early concept sketches of miracle (it’s old man, aging badly) and further development of crafter. i wanted to make him more… triumphant seeming, like bold and confident i guess, because hoo boy do i love his battle music, it’s so epic.

summary: FIFA 18/19 COMBINE TO BRING IN OVER 45 MILLION UNIQUE PLAYERS DURING THE LAST FISCAL YEAR
title: FIFA 18/19 COMBINE TO BRING IN OVER 45 MILLION UNIQUE PLAYERS DURING THE LAST FISCAL YEAR
body:
During EA’s full-year fiscal briefing, the company talked a bit about FIFA 18 and 19. Check out the latest stats on those games below.

- FIFA 18/19 drew 45 million unique players on PC, PlayStation 4, Switch, and Xbox One during fiscal year 2019
- FIFA Ultimate Team matches increased 15% year-over-year
- FIFA 19 was the best-selling console game in Europe in 2018

summary: FAN CREATES DETECTIVE PIKACHU-THEMED VERSION OF THE POKE RAP
title: FAN CREATES DETECTIVE PIKACHU-THEMED VERSION OF THE POKE RAP
